items.name: Americano
items.description: Espresso shots are topped with hot water to produce a light layer of crema

items.name: Espresso
items.description: A shot of espresso with a rich flavour and caramel-like sweetness.

items.name: Espresso Doppio
items.description: A shot of espresso with a rich flavour and caramel-like sweetness.

items.name: Espresso Con Panna
items.description: A rich espresso topped with a smooth layer of whipped cream for a balanced, indulgent taste

items.name: Macchiato
items.description: A caramelly-sweet shot of espresso marked with a small amount of foam

items.name: Turkish Coffee
items.description: Finely ground coffee brewed slowly for a strong flavor, rich body, and thick foam

items.name: Turkish Coffee Double
items.description: A stronger, richer version of Turkish coffee made with double coffee for an intense flavor and full body

items.name: Iced Americano
items.description: Espresso shots are topped with water to produce a light layer of crema, then served over ice. The result is this wonderfully rich cup with depth and nuance

items.name: Cold Brew
items.description: Slow-extracted for a naturally smooth profile, offering deep coffee notes with a clean, refreshing finish and a refined caffeine strength

items.name: Drip Coffee
items.description: Freshly brewed to deliver a clear, balanced cup, highlighting the coffee's aroma with a soft, comforting finish

items.name: Classic Cappuccino
items.description: Dark, rich espresso combined with steamed milk, topped with a deep layer of foam.

items.name: Cortado
items.description: Two ristretto shots topped with warm, silky milk served in a 6oz cup that gives you the needed coffee kick for your day

items.name: Flat White
items.description: Expertly steamed milk poured over two shots of espresso

items.name: Latte Classic
items.description: Our dark, rich espresso is balanced with steamed milk and topped with a light layer of foam. A perfect milk-forward warm up.

items.name: Mocha Dark
items.description: Espresso with dark chocolate flavoured sauce and steamed milk, topped with whipped cream

items.name: Mocha White
items.description: Espresso with white chocolate flavoured sauce and steamed milk, topped with whipped cream

items.name: Spanish Latte
items.description: Espresso with steamed milk and sweetened condensed milk

items.name: Iced Classic Latte
items.description: Our dark, rich espresso is combined with milk and served over ice. A perfect milk-forward cool down

items.name: Iced Dark Mocha
items.description: We combine our rich, full-bodied espresso with bittersweet mocha sauce, milk and ice, then top it off with whipped cream

items.name: Iced Spanish Latte
items.description: Cold espresso blended with chilled milk and premium sweetened condensed milk, creating a smooth, creamy body with a perfectly balanced sweetness

items.name: Iced White Chocolate Mocha
items.description: Espresso, milk and white chocolate flavoured sauce poured over ice. Topped with whipped cream

items.name: Hot Chocolate
items.description: A velvety hot chocolate crafted with rich cocoa and perfectly steamed milk, delivering a smooth and comforting chocolate experience

items.name: Hot Coconut with Strawberry
items.description: A creamy blend of coconut milk infused with a gentle strawberry note, offering a balanced mix of tropical smoothness and light fruity sweetness

items.name: Hot Lotus
items.description: Warm, silky milk blended with indulgent lotus spread, creating a caramelized, biscuit-like flavor with a smooth and satisfying finish

items.name: Hot Pistachio
items.description: Steamed milk combined with premium pistachio flavor, delivering a nutty, creamy taste that feels rich without being overpowering

items.name: Hot Pistachio With Cookies
items.description: A luxurious pistachio drink enhanced with cookie crumbles, adding a subtle crunch and an extra layer of warmth and sweetness

items.name: Karak Chai
items.description: A bold and aromatic chai infused with traditional spices and milk, offering a deep, warming flavor inspired by classic karak tea.

items.name: Iced Mango Tea
items.description: A bright iced tea infused with smooth mango notes, delivering a clean tropical refreshment with a light, crisp finish

items.name: Iced Watermelon Tea
items.description: Cool and delicate, blending refreshing tea with subtle watermelon sweetness for a smooth, thirst-quenching experience

items.name: Iced Peach Tea
items.description: Soft peach aromas layered into chilled tea, offering a balanced sweetness with a refined, refreshing profile

items.name: Lime Breeze
items.description: Zesty lime flavors combined with a crisp base, creating a sharp, refreshing drink with a clean citrus finish

items.name: Melon Breeze
items.description: Light and refreshing with gentle melon notes, delivering a smooth, cooling taste that feels effortlessly fresh

items.name: Orange Pomegranate Fresh Juice
items.description: A refined balance of citrus and tart pomegranate notes, creating a bold yet refreshing juice with a clean finish
